VAN.BR.summary: Van de Velde NV, together with its subsidiaries, designs, develops, manufactures, and markets fashionable luxury lingerie for women worldwide. It operates through two segments, Wholesale and Retail. The company offers its products under the PrimaDonna, Marie Jo, Andres Sarda, and Lingerie Styling brands. It also operates retail websites under the name of Rigby & Peller and Lincherie; and specialized boutiques and department stores, as well as approximately 5,000 retail stores. The company was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Schellebelle, Belgium. Van de Velde NV is a subsidiary of Van de Velde Holding NV.
